data.comment: The match has started at Audi Field.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in DC United.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Joseph Dickerson awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 10, Atlanta attack but Miles Robinson's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Miles Robinson (Atlanta) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 13, Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
Important block from the Atlanta defence as Yordy Reyna fires in a strike for DC United.
DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 14, Free kick for DC United in the half of Atlanta.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 16, Jon Gallagher is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Atlanta's Jon Gallagher is back in action after a slight knock.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for DC United close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to DC United.
Moses Nyeman (DC United) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 21, Atlanta surge into the attack at Audi Field but Adam Jahnâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 22, Franco Escobar of Atlanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Joseph Dickerson awards DC United a goal kick.
DC United are pushing forward but Chris Odoi-Atsem's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Atlanta at Audi Field.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Atlanta throw-in in DC United's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moses Nyeman (DC United) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 27, DC United have a goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Free kick DC United.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 30, Atlanta's George Bello has been booked in Washington, D.C..
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of DC United.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Atlanta just outside DC United's area.
Atlanta's Mo Adams breaks free at Audi Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Throw-in Atlanta.
Free kick DC United.
In the minute 35, Yordy Reyna for DC United gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Joseph Dickerson awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
In the minute 36, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Miles Robinson for Atlanta has been booked by Joseph Dickerson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for DC United in Washington, D.C..
Great finish from Brooks Lennon to give Atlanta a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 43, Free kick for DC United in the half of Atlanta.
Emerson Hyndman (Atlanta) has received a yellow card from Joseph Dickerson.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 45, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Julian Gressel is replacing Griffin Yow for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 46, Ben Olsen is making the team's first substitution at Audi Field with Kevin Paredes replacing Moses Nyeman.
In the minute 47, Joseph Dickerson signals a Atlanta throw-in in DC United's half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 48, Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to DC United's area.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of DC United.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Audi Field.
In Washington, D.C., Franco Escobar (Atlanta) misses the target with a header.
DC United have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Attention is being given to Atlantaâ€™s Franco Escobar and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, At Audi Field, DC United are penalized for being offside.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
In the minute 64, Atlanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
Franco Escobar for Atlanta is back on the field again.
DC United needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Joseph Dickerson signals a Atlanta throw-in in DC United's half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
DC United to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
In the minute 67, DC United make their third substitution with Erik Sorga replacing Ola Kamara.
Free kick DC United.
In Washington, D.C., Junior Moreno of DC United is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 70, Goal! Atlanta extend their lead to 0-4 thanks to a Adam Jahn header.
Brooks Lennon instrumental with a fine assist.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for DC United close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Steve Birnbaum (DC United) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Can Atlanta capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 74, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Atlanta.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Jurgen Damm is on a sub for George Bello for Atlanta.
Edgar Castillo is on a sub for Miles Robinson for Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United in the half of Atlanta.
The away team have replaced Mo Adams with Laurence Wyke. This is the first substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
DC United's Julian Gressel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
Atlanta make their fourth substitution with Manuel Castro replacing Adam Jahn.
In the minute 85, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Frederic Brillant DC United.
Donovan Pines is replacing Yordy Reyna for the home team.
In the minute 88, Jeff Larentowicz (Atlanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Joseph Dickerson will wait an extra 9 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick DC United.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Atlanta.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to DC United.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Atlanta drive upfield and Jeff Larentowicz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a DC United defender.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of DC United.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
Full-time! The final score is 0-4.
Yamil Asad is booked for the home team.
